item.title: Jointly Optimizing State Operation Prediction and Value Generation for Dialogue State Tracking
item.description: Transformer-DST 1. Key Idea Ïù¥Ï†Ñ ÎÖºÎ¨∏Îì§ÏóêÏÑúÎäî EncoderÏóêÏÑú BERTÎ•º ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÌïòÏßÄÎßå, Value GenerationÎ∂ÄÎ∂ÑÏóêÏÑúÎäî RNN DecoderÎ•º ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÌïòÎäî ÏïÑÏù¥Îü¨Îãà.. Purely Transformer-based‚Ä¶
item.content:encoded:
Transformer-DST

1. Key Idea

  • Ïù¥Ï†Ñ ÎÖºÎ¨∏Îì§ÏóêÏÑúÎäî EncoderÏóêÏÑú BERTÎ•º ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÌïòÏßÄÎßå, Value GenerationÎ∂ÄÎ∂ÑÏóêÏÑúÎäî RNN DecoderÎ•º ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÌïòÎäî ÏïÑÏù¥Îü¨Îãà..
  • Purely Transformer-based frameworkÎ•º ÏÇ¨Ïö© Ï¶â, Single BERTÍ∞Ä EncoderÏôÄ Decoder Î™®ÎëêÏóêÏÑú work ‚Üí Ïù¥Î†áÍ≤å ÌïòÎ©¥ prediction objectiveÏôÄ value generation objectiveÍ∞Ä BERT ÌïòÎÇòÎßå optimizeÌïòÍ≤å Îê®
  • Encoder(BERT)ÏóêÏÑú ÏÇ¨Ïö©Ìïú hidden states Í∞íÏùÑ Decoder(BERT)ÏóêÏÑú Re-useÍ∞Ä Í∞ÄÎä•Ìï¥Ïßê

2. Input

  • InputÏúºÎ°úÎäî SOM-DSTÏôÄ Í∞ôÏùÄ Íµ¨Ï°∞Î•º ÏßÄÎãò
  • ÏïÑÎûò Í∑∏Î¶ºÍ≥º Í∞ôÏù¥ D1, D2, S1ÏùÑ INPUTÏúºÎ°ú ÎÑ£Í≥†, OUTPUTÏúºÎ°ú S2Î•º Ï∂úÎ†•
  • Dt‚àí1,Dt,St‚àí1D_{t-1}, D_{t}, S_{t-1}Dt‚àí1‚Äã,Dt‚Äã,St‚àí1‚ÄãÏùÑ INPUTÏúºÎ°ú StS_{t}St‚ÄãÎ•º PREDICT
  • DtD_{t}Dt‚Äã : tÎ≤àÏß∏ dialogue turnÏùò (System utterance, User response) pair
  • StS_{t}St‚Äã : (dj,sj,vj)‚à£1<=j<=J(d_{j}, s_{j}, v_{j}) | 1<=j<=J(dj‚Äã,sj‚Äã,vj‚Äã)‚à£1<=j<=J

Ïó¨Í∏∞ÏÑú dddÎäî domain, sssÎäî slot, vvvÎäî valueÎ•º ÎÇòÌÉÄÎÉÑ

ÎßåÏïΩ, ÏïÑÎ¨¥ Ï†ïÎ≥¥ÎèÑ ÏóÜÏùÑÏãú (dj,sj)(d_{j}, s_{j})(dj‚Äã,sj‚Äã)Î°ú ÎÇòÌÉÄÎÇ¥Í≥†, vjv_{j}vj‚ÄãÎäî NULL

3. Overview

  • ÏôºÏ™ΩÏùÄ Transformer Encoder, Ïò§Î•∏Ï™ΩÏùÄ Transformer Decoder
  • Encoder (ÏôºÏ™Ω)ÏóêÏÑú hslLh_{sl}^{L}hslL‚Äã (hidden state)Î•º ÎΩëÏïÑÎÇ¥Í≥†, Decoder (Ïò§Î•∏Ï™Ω)ÏóêÏÑú Re-useÌïòÎäî Î∞©Î≤ïÏúºÎ°ú ÏÇ¨Ïö©Îê®
  • Decoder (Ïò§Î•∏Ï™Ω)ÏùÄ left-to-right attention (ÏôºÏ™ΩÏóêÏÑú Ïò§Î•∏Ï™ΩÏúºÎ°ú Ï∞®Î°ÄÎ°ú Ï∂úÎ†•ÌïòÎäî language model, Ï¶â ÏôºÏ™Ω Ï∂úÎ†•Í∞íÏù¥ Ïò§Î•∏Ï™Ω ÏûÖÎ†•)

4. Encoder

  • EncoderÏùò InputÏùÄ Dt‚àí1,Dt,St‚àí1D_{t-1}, D_{t}, S_{t-1}Dt‚àí1‚Äã,Dt‚Äã,St‚àí1‚Äã 3Í∞ÄÏßÄÍ∞Ä Îì§Ïñ¥Í∞ê

    • DtD_{t}Dt‚ÄãÎäî tÎ≤àÏß∏ turnÏùò ( System Utterance, User Resposne ) pair
    • St‚àí1S_{t-1}St‚àí1‚ÄãÏùÄ (dj,sj,vj)‚à£1<=j<=J(d_{j}, s_{j}, v_{j}) | 1<= j <= J(dj‚Äã,sj‚Äã,vj‚Äã)‚à£1<=j<=J

4-1) Encoder Input

  • [SLOT]‚®Ådj‚®Å‚àí‚®Åsj‚®Å‚àí‚®Åvj[SLOT] \bigoplus d_{j} \bigoplus - \bigoplus s_{j} \bigoplus - \bigoplus v_{j}[SLOT]‚®Ådj‚Äã‚®Å‚àí‚®Åsj‚Äã‚®Å‚àí‚®Åvj‚Äã ÏúºÎ°ú Íµ¨ÏÑ±

    • ‚®Å\bigoplus‚®ÅÎäî concatÏùÑ ÎÇòÌÉÄÎÉÑ
    • Ï¥ù JJJÍ∞úÏùò domain-slotÏóê ÎåÄÌï¥ÏÑú ÎßåÎì§Ïñ¥Ï§å
    • [SLOT]‚®Ådj‚®Å‚àí‚®Åsj‚®Å‚àí‚®Åvj[SLOT] \bigoplus d_{j} \bigoplus - \bigoplus s_{j} \bigoplus - \bigoplus v_{j}[SLOT]‚®Ådj‚Äã‚®Å‚àí‚®Åsj‚Äã‚®Å‚àí‚®Åvj‚Äã * JÎ≤à
  • [SLOT][SLOT][SLOT]ÏùÄ Transformer blockÏùÑ ÌÜµÍ≥ºÌïú ÌõÑ, XsljlX^{l}_{sl_{j}}Xslj‚Äãl‚Äã ÌòïÌÉúÎ°ú Ï∂úÎ†•ÎêòÎ©∞, Prediction (CARRYOVER, ..., UPDATE Îì±)ÏúºÎ°ú ÏÇ¨Ïö©Îê®

4-2) Multi-head self-attention

  • Multi-head Self-attention Îß§Ïπ¥ÎãàÏ¶ò ÏÇ¨Ïö©

  • Ïó¨Í∏∞ÏÑú MxM^{x}Mx : self-attention mask matrix

    • Mx‚ààR‚à£x‚à£√ó‚à£x‚à£M^{x} \in R^{|x| \times |x|}Mx‚ààR‚à£x‚à£√ó‚à£x‚à£
    • Mijx‚àà{0,‚àí‚àû}M^{x}_{ij} \in \{0, - \infty \}Mijx‚Äã‚àà{0,‚àí‚àû}
    • Mijx=0M^{x}_{ij} = 0Mijx‚Äã=0Ïù¥Î©¥ i-th positionÏù¥ j-th positionÏóê attendÌïòÎã§Îäî ÏùòÎØ∏
    • Mijx=‚àí‚àûM^{x}_{ij} = -\inftyMijx‚Äã=‚àí‚àûÏù¥Î©¥ i-th positionÍ≥º j-th positionÏùÑ preventsÌïòÍ≤†Îã§Îäî ÏùòÎØ∏

4-3) Encoder Output

XL=[xclsL,x1L,...,xsl1L,...,xslJL,...]X^{L} = [x^{L}_{cls}, x^{L}_{1}, ..., x^L_{sl_{1}}, ..., x^{L}_{sl_{J}},...]XL=[xclsL‚Äã,x1L‚Äã,...,xsl1‚ÄãL‚Äã,...,xslJ‚ÄãL‚Äã,...]

4-4) Encoder Objective

  • Encoder outputs xsljLx^{L}_{sl_{j}}xslj‚ÄãL‚ÄãÏóêÏÑú [SLOT][SLOT][SLOT]Ïπ∏Ïóê Ìï¥ÎãπÌïòÎäî Í∞íÏùÑ ÌôïÏù∏
  • CARRYOVER, DELETE, DONTCARE, UPDATE
  • UPDATEÏùò Í≤ΩÏö∞ÏóêÎßå decoder generaterÏóêÏÑú ÏÇ¨Ïö©Ìï®

5. Decoder (Slot Value Generation)

  • Left-to-right self-attentionÏùÑ ÏÇ¨Ïö©Ìï®
  • EncoderÏóêÏÑú ÎèÑÏ∂úÌï¥ÎÇ∏ hidden statesÎ•º decoderÏóêÏÑú reuse
  • ResueÏùò ÏùòÎØ∏Îäî hidden stateÎ•º decoderÏóêÏÑú Îã§Ïãú ÌïúÎ≤à Í≥ÑÏÇ∞Ìï† ÌïÑÏöîÍ∞Ä ÏóÜÏñ¥ÏßÑÎã§Îäî ÏùòÎØ∏Î•º Í∞ñÏùå.

5-1) Decoder Input

  • Encoder (reuse)

    • ÏôºÏ™ΩÏùò DtD_{t}Dt‚ÄãÏôÄ [SLOT][SLOT][SLOT]ÏùÄ Encoder Î∂ÄÎ∂ÑÏùÑ ÎÇòÌÉÄÎÉÑ
    • ÌòÑÏû¨ turnÏùò DtD_{t}Dt‚ÄãÏùò hidden state vectorÎ•º ÏÇ¨Ïö©Ìï®
    • [SLOT][SLOT][SLOT] Ï§ë UPDATEÎ°ú predictionÏù¥ Îêú hidden state vectorÎßå ÏÇ¨Ïö©Ìï®

  • Decoder

    • [BOS][BOS][BOS]Îäî StringÏùò ÏãúÏûë
    • w1vj,w2vjw^{v_{j}}_1, w^{v_{j}}_2w1vj‚Äã‚Äã,w2vj‚Äã‚ÄãÎäî decoderÏùò outputÏùÑ Îã§Ïãú inputÏúºÎ°ú Í∞ÄÏßÄÍ≥† ÏôÄÏÑú ÏÇ¨Ïö© (left-to-right self-attention)

5-2) Left-to-right self-attention

  • ÏùºÎ∞ò Multi-head attentionÌïòÍ≥† ÎπÑÏä∑
  • X^\hat{X}X^ : re-usedÎêú encoder hidden states
  • YYY : Decoder hidden states
  • X^\hat{X}X^ÏôÄ YYYÎ•º concatÌï¥ÏÑú ÏÇ¨Ïö©
  • ÎßåÏïΩ j‚â§ij \leq ij‚â§iÏùºÎïå, Mijy=0M^{y}_{ij} = 0Mijy‚Äã=0 ÏúºÎ°ú ÏÇ¨Ïö© (left-to-right attention)

5-3) Decoder Objective

  • Generated slot value lossÏôÄ ground-truth slot valueÎ•º ÎπÑÍµêÌï¥ÏÑú LossÎ•º ÏÇ∞Ï∂ú
  • Teacher ForcingÏùÑ Î™®Îì† timeÏóêÏÑú ÏÇ¨Ïö©

Í≤∞Í≥º

  • MutliWOZ 2.0Í≥º MultiWOZ 2.1ÏóêÏÑú Ï†úÏ∂ú ÎãπÏãú SOTA

  • Í∞ÅÍ∞ÅÏùò DomainÏùò Joint goal AccuracyÎ•º ÎπÑÍµê

    • Ïã†Í∏∞Ìïú Ï†êÏùÄ Taxi ÎπºÍ≥† (Îã§Î•∏ Î™®Îç∏Î≥¥Îã§) ÎÜíÏùÄ ÏÑ±Îä•ÏùÑ Î≥¥ÏûÑ
    • Ïù¥Ïú†Î•º Ï∞æÏïÑÎ≥¥Îãà TaxiÏùò Í≤ΩÏö∞ TrainÍ≥ºÏùò co-occurrence relationsÍ∞Ä ÏûàÏùå
    • ÌïòÏßÄÎßå OursÏóêÎäî Ïù¥Îü¨Ìïú Ï†êÏùÑ Ìï¥Í≤∞ÌïòÎ†§Í≥† ÌïòÏßÄÎäî ÏïäÏïòÏùå
  • ÏãúÍ∞ÑÏùò Í≤ΩÏö∞ SOM-DSTÎ≥¥Îã§Îäî Inference timeÏù¥ Ïò§ÎûòÍ±∏Î¶º
  • ReuseÎ•º ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÌñàÏùÑ Í≤ΩÏö∞ÏóêÎèÑ Ïó¨Îü¨Í∞ÄÏßÄ Î∞©Î≤ïÏùÑ ÏãúÎèÑÌï¥Î≥¥ÏïòÍ≥†, Dt+[SLOT]D_{t} + [SLOT]Dt‚Äã+[SLOT]ÏùÑ ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÌñàÏùÑ Îïå Joint AccuracyÏóêÏÑú Ï¢ãÏùÄ ÏÑ±Îä•ÏùÑ Î≥¥ÏòÄÏùå

Ï∞∏Í≥† ÏûêÎ£å

  • ÎÖºÎ¨∏: Jointly Optimizing State Operation Prediction and Value Generation for Dialogue State Tracking
  • GitHub: Transformer-DST

item.title: Efficient Dialogue State Tracking by Selectively Overwriting Memory
item.description: SOM-DST SOM-DST Í∏∞Ï°¥ Î™®Îç∏Ïùò Î¨∏Ï†úÏ†ê Ontology-based DST Ïã§Ï†ú ÏãúÎÇòÎ¶¨Ïò§Ïóê Ïûò ÎåÄÏùëÌïòÏßÄ Î™ªÌï® unseen valueÎ•º Ï≤òÎ¶¨Ìï† Ïàò ÏóÜÏùå ontologyÍ∞Ä ÎßéÏúºÎ©¥ Ï≤òÎ¶¨ ÏãúÍ∞ÑÏù¥ Ïò§Îûò Í±∏Î¶º Open-vocab-based DST‚Ä¶
item.content:encoded:
SOM-DST

Í∏∞Ï°¥ Î™®Îç∏Ïùò Î¨∏Ï†úÏ†ê

Ontology-based DST

  • Ïã§Ï†ú ÏãúÎÇòÎ¶¨Ïò§Ïóê Ïûò ÎåÄÏùëÌïòÏßÄ Î™ªÌï®
  • unseen valueÎ•º Ï≤òÎ¶¨Ìï† Ïàò ÏóÜÏùå
  • ontologyÍ∞Ä ÎßéÏúºÎ©¥ Ï≤òÎ¶¨ ÏãúÍ∞ÑÏù¥ Ïò§Îûò Í±∏Î¶º

Open-vocab-based DST (TRADE)

  • turnÎßàÎã§ slotÏùò Î™®Îì† valueÎ•º ÏÉùÏÑ±Ìï¥ÏïºÌï¥ÏÑú ÎπÑÌö®Ïú®Ï†ÅÏûÑ

Definition

ttt: turn

SjS^jSj: slot

VtjV^j_tVtj‚Äã: corresponding slot value

JJJ: total number of such slots

rtj‚ààO={CARRYOVER,¬†DELETE,¬†DONTCARE,¬†UPDATE}r^j_t\in O = \left\{\rm\textbf{CARRYOVER, DELETE, DONTCARE, UPDATE}\right\}rtj‚Äã‚ààO={CARRYOVER,¬†DELETE,¬†DONTCARE,¬†UPDATE}

AtA_tAt‚Äã: System response

UtU_tUt‚Äã: User utterance

State Operation Predictor (Encoder)

Encoder Î™®Îç∏Î°ú pretrained BERT encoder ÏÇ¨Ïö©

Encoder InputÏùÑ ÎßåÎì§Í∏∞ ÏúÑÌïú Ï§ÄÎπÑÎ¨º

Dt=At‚äï;‚äïUt‚äï[SEP]D_t = A_t ‚äï ; ‚äï U_t ‚äï [SEP]Dt‚Äã=At‚Äã‚äï;‚äïUt‚Äã‚äï[SEP]: dialogue utterances at turn t

  • ; AtA_tAt‚ÄãÏôÄ UtU_tUt‚ÄãÎ•º Íµ¨Î∂ÑÌïòÍ∏∞ ÏúÑÌïú Ïä§ÌéòÏÖú ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞
  • [SEP] dialogue turnÏù¥ ÎÅùÎÇ¨Îã§Îäî Í≤ÉÏùÑ ÌëúÏãúÌïòÍ∏∞ ÏúÑÌïú Ïä§ÌéòÏÖú ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞

Btj=[SLOT]j‚äïSj‚äï‚àí‚äïVtjB_t^j = [SLOT]^j ‚äï S^j ‚äï - ‚äï V_t^jBtj‚Äã=[SLOT]j‚äïSj‚äï‚àí‚äïVtj‚Äã : representation of the j-th slot-value pair

  • j-th slot-value pairÎ•º ÌïòÎÇòÏùò Î≤°ÌÑ∞Î°ú aggregate

  • ‚Äò[SLOT]j‚Äò`[SLOT]^j`‚Äò[SLOT]j‚Äò

    [SLOT] Ïù¥ÎùºÎäî Ïä§ÌéòÏÖú ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞ÏùÑ ÏÇ¨Ïö©

    BERTÏùò [CLS] ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞Í≥º Í∞ôÏùÄ Ïó≠Ìï†

  • ‚ÄòVtj‚Äò`V_t^j`‚ÄòVtj‚Äã‚Äò

Bt=Bt1‚äï...‚äïBtJB_t = B_t^1 ‚äï ... ‚äï B_t^JBt‚Äã=Bt1‚Äã‚äï...‚äïBtJ‚Äã : representation of the dialogue state at turn t

Encoder Input

$$X_t = [CLS] ‚äï D_{t-1} ‚äïD_t ‚äï B_{t-1}$$

segment id:        0       1         1

‚áí Input : Sum(XtX_tXt‚Äã embedding, segment id embedding, positional embedding)

dialogue historyÎ°ú Ïù¥Ï†Ñ ÌÑ¥Ïùò dialogue utterances Dt‚àí1D_{t-1}Dt‚àí1‚ÄãÏùÑ ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÌïúÎã§. dialogue historyÏùò size: 1

Î™®Îç∏Ïù¥ ÏûÖÎ†•ÏúºÎ°ú Îì§Ïñ¥Ïò§Îäî dialogue Í∞ÑÏùò Markov propertyÎ•º Í∞ÄÏ†ï

Ïù¥Ï†Ñ turn dialogue state Bt‚àí1B_{t-1}Bt‚àí1‚ÄãÏùÄ Ï†ÑÏ≤¥ dialogue historyÎ•º ÏïïÏ∂ïÏ†ÅÏúºÎ°ú ÌëúÌòÑÌïòÎäî Ïó≠Ìï†

Encoder Output

Ht‚ààR‚à£Xt‚à£√ódH_t \in \mathbb R^{\left|X_t\right|\times d}Ht‚Äã‚ààR‚à£Xt‚Äã‚à£√ód : htXh_t^{\rm X}htX‚Äã (t=1...t)(t=1...t)(t=1...t) ÍπåÏßÄ ÏßëÌï©

ht[CLS],ht[SLOT]j‚ààRdh_t^{[CLS]}, h_t^{[SLOT]^j} \in \mathrm R^dht[CLS]‚Äã,ht[SLOT]j‚Äã‚ààRd

  • [CLS],[SLOT]j[CLS], [SLOT]^j[CLS],[SLOT]jÏóê ÎåÄÏùëÌïòÎäî output

htX=tanh(Wpoolht[CLS])h_t^X = tanh(W_{pool} h_t^{[CLS]})htX‚Äã=tanh(Wpool‚Äãht[CLS]‚Äã)

  • htXh_t^XhtX‚Äã: Ï†ÑÏ≤¥ input XtX_tXt‚ÄãÎ•º sequenceÎ°ú aggregate
  • Wpool‚ààRd√ódW_{pool} \in \mathbb R^{d\times d}Wpool‚Äã‚ààRd√ód: feed-forward layer with a learnable parameter

State Operation Prediction

Popr,tj=softmax(Woprht[SLOT]j)P^j_{opr, t} = softmax(W_{opr} h_t^{[SLOT]^j})Popr,tj‚Äã=softmax(Wopr‚Äãht[SLOT]j‚Äã)

  • Wopr‚ààR‚à£O‚à£√ódW_{opr} \in \mathbb R^{\left| O\right|\times d}Wopr‚Äã‚ààR‚à£O‚à£√ód : learnable parameter
  • Popr,tj‚ààR‚à£O‚à£P_{opr, t}^j \in \mathbb R^{\left| O\right|}Popr,tj‚Äã‚ààR‚à£O‚à£ : j-th slotÏùò turn tÏóêÏÑúÏùò Ïó∞ÏÇ∞Ïóê ÎåÄÌïú ÌôïÎ•† Î∂ÑÌè¨

  • SOM-DSTÏóêÏÑúÎäî ‚à£O‚à£=4\left| O\right| = 4‚à£O‚à£=4,

    O={CARRYOVER,DELETE,DONTCARE,UPDATE}O = \left\{\rm{CARRYOVER, DELETE, DONTCARE, UPDATE}\right\}O={CARRYOVER,DELETE,DONTCARE,UPDATE}

‚Üí rtj=argmax(Popr,tj)r_t^j = argmax(P_{opr, t}^j)rtj‚Äã=argmax(Popr,tj‚Äã)

‚Üí slotÏùò OperationÏùò Í≤∞Í≥ºÍ∞Ä UPDATE Ïùº Îïå slot valueÎ•º generation

  • EncoderÏóêÏÑú ÎÇòÏò® OperationÏùò Í≤∞Í≥ºÍ∞Ä UpdateÏù∏ Í≤ΩÏö∞Î•º ÏßëÌï©ÏúºÎ°ú ÌëúÌòÑÌïòÎ©¥

    Ut={j‚à£rtj=UPDATE}\mathbb{U}_t = \left\{j|r_t^j = \rm{UPDATE}\right\}Ut‚Äã={j‚à£rtj‚Äã=UPDATE}, and its size as Jt‚Ä≤=‚à£Ut‚à£J_t^\prime = \left| \mathbb{U}_t\right|Jt‚Ä≤‚Äã=‚à£Ut‚Äã‚à£

    Recab for V

Slot Value Generator (Decoder)

  • EncoderÏóêÏÑú ÎÇòÏò® OperationÏùò Í≤∞Í≥ºÍ∞Ä Update Ïù∏ Í≤ΩÏö∞ Ìï¥Îãπ slotÏùò valueÎ•º ÏòàÏ∏°

  • SOM-DSTÏùò generatorÎäî valueÎ•º JJJÍ∞úÍ∞Ä ÏïÑÎãå Jt‚Ä≤J^\prime_tJt‚Ä≤‚ÄãÍ∞úÏùò slotÏóê ÎåÄÌï¥ÏÑúÎßå ÎßåÎì§Ïñ¥Ï§ÄÎã§.

    ÎåÄÎ∂ÄÎ∂ÑÏùò Í≤ΩÏö∞ÏóêÏÑú Jt‚Ä≤‚â™JJ^\prime_t \ll JJt‚Ä≤‚Äã‚â™JÏù¥Í∏∞ ÎïåÎ¨∏Ïóê Îçî Ìö®Ïú®Ï†ÅÏù¥ÎùºÍ≥† Ï£ºÏû•

  • Decoder Î™®Îç∏Î°ú GRU ÏÇ¨Ïö©

    • ÏûÖÎ†•ÏúºÎ°ú word embedding vector etj,ke_t^{j,k}etj,k‚ÄãÎ•º Î∞õÏúºÎ©¥ÏÑú GRUÏùò hidden state vector gtj,kg_t^{j, k}gtj,k‚ÄãÎ•º recurrentÌïòÍ≤å ÏóÖÎç∞Ïù¥Ìä∏
    • gtj,0=htxg_t^{j, 0} = h_t^{\rm x}gtj,0‚Äã=htx‚Äã, etj,0=ht[slot]je_t^{j,0} = h_t^{[slot]j}etj,0‚Äã=ht[slot]j‚Äã: GRUÏóê Îì§Ïñ¥Í∞ÄÎäî Ï¥àÍ∏∞Í∞í
    • gtj,k=GRU(gtj,k‚àí1,etj,k)g_t^{j, k} = GRU(g_t^{j, k-1}, e_t^{j,k})gtj,k‚Äã=GRU(gtj,k‚àí1‚Äã,etj,k‚Äã)
    • etj,ke_t^{j,k}etj,k‚ÄãÍ∞Ä [EOS] ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞Ïù¥ ÎÇòÏò¨ÎïåÍπåÏßÄ ÏßÑÌñâ

    • hidden state gtj,kg_t^{j, k}gtj,k‚ÄãÎäî k-th decoding stepÏùÑ Í±∞ÏπòÎ©¥ÏÑú vocabulary ÏôÄ user utteranceÏùò Îã®Ïñ¥Ïóê ÎåÄÌïú ÌôïÎ•† Î∂ÑÌè¨Î°ú Î≥ÄÌï®

      Pvcb,tj,k=softmax(Egtj,k)‚ààRdvcbP^{j, k}_{vcb, t} = softmax(Eg^{j, k}_t) \in \mathbb R^{d_{vcb}}Pvcb,tj,k‚Äã=softmax(Egtj,k‚Äã)‚ààRdvcb‚Äã

      • E‚ààRdvcb√ódE \in \mathbb R^{d_{vcb}\times d}E‚ààRdvcb‚Äã√ód: EncoderÏôÄ DecoderÍ∞Ä ÏÑúÎ°ú Í≥µÏú†ÌïòÎäî word embedding matrix

        • dvcbd_{vcb}dvcb‚Äã: vocabulary size

      Pctx,tj,k=softmax(Htgtj,k)‚ààR‚à£Xt‚à£P^{j, k}_{ctx, t} = softmax(H_t g_t^{j, k}) \in \mathbb R^{\left|X_t\right|}Pctx,tj,k‚Äã=softmax(Ht‚Äãgtj,k‚Äã)‚ààR‚à£Xt‚Äã‚à£

      • user utteranceÏùò Îã®Ïñ¥Ïóê ÎåÄÌïú ÌôïÎ•† Î∂ÑÌè¨

      Pval,tj,k=Œ±Pvcb,tj,k+(1‚àíŒ±)Pctx,tj,kP^{j, k}_{val, t} = \alpha P^{j, k}_{vcb, t} + (1-\alpha) P^{j, k}_{ctx, t}Pval,tj,k‚Äã=Œ±Pvcb,tj,k‚Äã+(1‚àíŒ±)Pctx,tj,k‚Äã: final output distribution

      • Œ±=sigmoid(W1[gtj,k;etj,k;ctj,k])\alpha = sigmoid(W_1 \left[g^{j, k}_t ; e^{j, k}_t ; c^{j, k}_t\right])Œ±=sigmoid(W1‚Äã[gtj,k‚Äã;etj,k‚Äã;ctj,k‚Äã])

        • W1‚ààR1√ó(3d)W_1 \in \mathbb R^{1\times (3d)}W1‚Äã‚ààR1√ó(3d): learnable parameter
        • ctj,k=Pctx,tj,kHt‚ààRdc^{j, k}_t = P^{j, k}_{ctx, t} H_t \in \mathbb R^dctj,k‚Äã=Pctx,tj,k‚ÄãHt‚Äã‚ààRd: context vector

Objective Function

State operation predictor

Main Task

state operation classification

Auxiliary Task

domain classification

state operation classification Ïô∏ÏóêÎèÑ domain classificationÏùÑ Î≥¥Ï°∞ taskÎ°ú ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÌïòÏó¨ Î™®Îç∏Ïù¥ dialogue turn Í∞ÑÏùò slot operationÍ≥º domain transitionÏùò ÏÉÅÍ¥Ä Í¥ÄÍ≥ÑÎ•º ÌïôÏäµÌïòÎèÑÎ°ù Ìï®

Pdom,t=softmax(WdomhtX)P_{dom, t} = softmax(W_{dom} h_t^{\rm X})Pdom,t‚Äã=softmax(Wdom‚ÄãhtX‚Äã)

  • Wdom‚ààRddom√ódW_{dom} \in \mathbb R^{d_{dom}\times d}Wdom‚Äã‚ààRddom‚Äã√ód: learnable parameter

  • Pdom,t‚ààRddomP_{dom, t} \in \mathbb R^{d_{dom}}Pdom,t‚Äã‚ààRddom‚Äã: turn tÏóêÏÑú domainÏóê ÎåÄÌïú ÌôïÎ•† Î∂ÑÌè¨

    • ddomd_{dom}ddom‚Äã: # of domains defined in the dataset

Average of the negative log-likelihood

Lopr,t=‚àí1J‚àëj=1J(Yopr,tj)‚ä§log(Popr,tj)L_{opr, t} = -\frac{1}{J}\sum_{j=1}^{J}(Y_{opr, t}^j)^\top log(P^j_{opr, t})Lopr,t‚Äã=‚àíJ1‚Äã‚àëj=1J‚Äã(Yopr,tj‚Äã)‚ä§log(Popr,tj‚Äã)

Ldom,t=‚àí(Ydom,t)‚ä§log(Pdom,t)L_{dom, t} = -(Y_{dom, t})^\top log(P_{dom, t})Ldom,t‚Äã=‚àí(Ydom,t‚Äã)‚ä§log(Pdom,t‚Äã)

  • Ydom,t‚ààRddomY_{dom, t} \in \mathbb R^{d_{dom}}Ydom,t‚Äã‚ààRddom‚Äã: one-hot vector for the ground truth domain
  • Yopr,tj‚ààR‚à£O‚à£Y^j_{opr, t} \in \mathbb R^{\left| O\right|}Yopr,tj‚Äã‚ààR‚à£O‚à£: one-hot vector for the ground truth operation for the j-th slot

Slot value generator

Average of the negative log-likelihood

Lsvg,t=‚àí1‚à£Ut‚à£‚àëj‚ààUt[1Ktj‚àëk=1Ktj(Yval,tj,k)‚ä§log(Pval,tj,k)]L_{svg, t} = -\frac{1}{\left|\mathbb U_t\right|}\sum_{j\in\mathbb U_t}^{}\left[\frac{1}{K^j_t}\sum_{k=1}^{K^j_t}(Y_{val, t}^{j, k})^{\top}log(P^{j, k}_{val, t})\right]Lsvg,t‚Äã=‚àí‚à£Ut‚Äã‚à£1‚Äã‚àëj‚ààUt‚Äã‚Äã[Ktj‚Äã1‚Äã‚àëk=1Ktj‚Äã‚Äã(Yval,tj,k‚Äã)‚ä§log(Pval,tj,k‚Äã)]

  • KtjK_t^jKtj‚Äã: # of tokens of the ground truth value that needs to be generated for the j-th slot
  • Yval,tj,k‚ààRdvcbY_{val, t}^{j, k} \in \mathbb R^{d_{vcb}}Yval,tj,k‚Äã‚ààRdvcb‚Äã: one-hot vector for the ground truth token that needs to be generated for the j-th slot at the k-th decoding step

Final Loss

to minimized Ljoint,t=Lopr,t+Ldom,t+Lsvg,tL_{joint, t} = L_{opr, t} + L_{dom, t} + L_{svg, t}Ljoint,t‚Äã=Lopr,t‚Äã+Ldom,t‚Äã+Lsvg,t‚Äã

Experimental Setup

Datasets

MultiWOZ 2.0 and MultiWOZ 2.1

Training

  • Encoder : Bert-base-uncased
  • Decoder : GRU
  • Hidden size : 768
  • Optimizer : BertAdam
  • Encoder LR and warmup : 4e-5, 0.1
  • Decoder LR and warmup : 1e-4, 0.1
  • Batch size : 32
  • Dropout : 0.1
  • Word Dropout Ï†ÅÏö©, 0.1ÌôïÎ•†Î°ú word Î•º [UNK] Î°ú Î∞îÍøà
  • Input max length : 256
  • Training Epoch : 30

Í≤∞Í≥º

Joint Goal Accuracy

‚Ä† indicates the case where BERT-large is used for our model

Domain-specific Accuracy

Latency

ÌèâÍ∞Ä

  • JGA, Domain-specific Accuracy ÏóêÏÑú SOTA ÌòπÏùÄ ÎπÑÏä∑Ìïú ÏàòÏ§ÄÏùò ÏÑ±Îä•ÏùÑ Î≥¥Ïó¨Ï§å
  • inferecnce ÌÉÄÏûÑÏù¥ Îß§Ïö∞ ÏßßÏùåÏóêÎèÑ Î∂àÍµ¨ÌïòÍ≥† Ï¢ãÏùÄ ÏÑ±Îä•ÏùÑ Î≥¥Ïó¨Ï§å

Ï∞∏Í≥† ÏûêÎ£å

  • ÎÖºÎ¨∏: Efficient Dialogue State Tracking by Selectively Overwriting Memory
  • ÏòÅÏÉÅ: [Paper Review] SOM-DST : Efficient Dialogue State Tracking by Selectively Overwriting Memory - KoreaUniv DSBA
  • GitHub: SOM-DST

item.title: A Contextual Hierarchical Attention Network with Adaptive Objective for Dialogue State Tracking
item.description: CHAN-DST slot imbalance Î¨∏Ï†úÎ•º Ìï¥Í≤∞ÌïòÍ≥†Ïûê adaptive objectiveÎ•º ÎèÑÏûÖ a contextual hierarchical attention network (CHAN)Î•º ÏÇ¨Ïö©: dislogue historyÏóêÏÑú relevant‚Ä¶
item.content:encoded:
CHAN-DST

  • slot imbalance Î¨∏Ï†úÎ•º Ìï¥Í≤∞ÌïòÍ≥†Ïûê adaptive objectiveÎ•º ÎèÑÏûÖ
  • a contextual hierarchical attention network (CHAN)Î•º ÏÇ¨Ïö©: dislogue historyÏóêÏÑú relevant contextÎ•º Ï∞æÍ∏∞ ÏúÑÌï® ‚Üí Í∞Å ÌÑ¥Ïùò Î∞úÌôîÎ°úÎ∂ÄÌÑ∞ word-level Í¥ÄÎ†® Ï†ïÎ≥¥ Í≤ÄÏÉâ ‚Üí contextual representationÏúºÎ°ú encode ‚Üí Î™®Îì† contextÌëúÌòÑÏùÑ turn-levelÍ¥ÄÎ†® Ï†ïÎ≥¥Î°ú ÏßëÍ≥ÑÌïú ÌõÑ word-level Ï†ïÎ≥¥ÏôÄ Ìï©Ïπú output ÏÉùÏÑ±
  • state transition prediction task

Definition

  • TTT: turn
  • UtU_tUt‚Äã: user utterance of turn t
  • RtR_tRt‚Äã: system response of turn t
  • XXX: {(U1,R1),...,(UT,RT)}\left\{(U_1, R_1), ... , (U_T, R_T)\right\}{(U1‚Äã,R1‚Äã),...,(UT‚Äã,RT‚Äã)}
  • BtB_tBt‚Äã: {(s,vt),s‚ààS}\left\{(s, v_t), s \in S\right\}{(s,vt‚Äã),s‚ààS}
  • SSS: set of slots
  • vtv_tvt‚Äã: corresponding value of the slot sss
  • slot: concatenation of a domain name and a slot name

Contextual Hierarchical Attention Network

1. Sentence Encoder

utterance encoder

  • BERT special tokenÏÇ¨Ïö© ‚Üí [CLS] : Î¨∏Ïû•Ïùò representationÎì§ÏùÑ Ìï©ÏπòÍ∏∞ÏúÑÌï¥ ÏÇ¨Ïö© (to aggregate the whole representation of a sentence) ‚Üí [SEP] : Î¨∏Ïû•Ïùò ÎÅùÏùÑ ÎÇòÌÉÄÎÇ¥Í∏∞ÏúÑÌï¥ ÏÇ¨Ïö©.
  • Ut={w1u,...,wlu}U_t = \left\{w_1^u, ..., w_l^u\right\}Ut‚Äã={w1u‚Äã,...,wlu‚Äã} (user utterance) Rt={w1r,...,wl‚Ä≤r}R_t = \left\{w_1^r, ..., w_{l'}^r\right\}Rt‚Äã={w1r‚Äã,...,wl‚Ä≤r‚Äã} (system response) ttt: dialogue turn
  • ht=BERTfinetune([Rt;Ut])h_t = BERT_{finetune}([R_t;U_t])ht‚Äã=BERTfinetune‚Äã([Rt‚Äã;Ut‚Äã]) (hth_tht‚Äã: contextual word representations)
  • Ïó¨Í∏∞ÏÑú BERT finetuneÏùÄ trainingÎèÑÏ§ë finetuningÏù¥ Îê†Í≤ÉÏùÑ ÏùòÎØ∏.

slot-value encoder

  • BERTfixedBERT_{fixed}BERTfixed‚ÄãÎäî contextual semantics vectorsÎ°ú encodeÌï¥Ï§ÄÎã§.
  • utterance encodeÌï†ÎïåÏôÄ Îã§Î•∏ Ï†êÏùÄ [CLS] ÌÜ†ÌÅ∞Ïùò output vectorÎ•º Ï†ÑÏ≤¥ Î¨∏Ïû• representationÌï†Îïå ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÌïúÎã§. (to obtain the whole sentence representation)
  • hs=BERTfixed(s)h_s = BERT_{fixed}(s)hs‚Äã=BERTfixed‚Äã(s) htv=BERTfixed(vt)h_t^v = BERT_{fixed}(v_t)htv‚Äã=BERTfixed‚Äã(vt‚Äã)
  • BERTfixedBERT_{fixed}BERTfixed‚ÄãÎäî training ÎèÑÏ§ë Í≥†Ï†ïÎêòÏñ¥ÏûàÎã§. Í∑∏ÎûòÏÑú Ïö∞Î¶¨ Î™®Îç∏ÏùÄ unseen slots and valuesÏóê ÎåÄÌï¥ÏÑú original BERT representationÎ°ú ÌôïÏû•Ìï¥ÏÑú Î≥¥ÎäîÍ≤å Í∞ÄÎä•ÌïòÎã§.

2. Slot-Word Attention

  • slot-word attentionÏùÄ multi-head attentionÏùÑ ÏÇ¨Ïö©ÌïúÎã§.
  • cs,tword=MultiHead(hs,ht,ht)c_{s,t}^{word} = MultiHead(h^s, h_t, h_t)cs,tword‚Äã=MultiHead(hs,ht‚Äã,ht‚Äã)

3. Context Encoder

  • context encoder : unidirectional transformer encoder
  • {1, ..., t} ÌÑ¥ÏóêÏÑú Ï∂îÏ∂ú Îêú word-level slot-related Ï†ïÎ≥¥Ïùò contextual relevanceÎ•º Î™®Îç∏ÎßÅÌïòÍ∏∞ ÏúÑÌïú Í≤É.

  • NNNÍ∞úÏùò idencticalÌïú layerÍ∞Ä ÏûàÎã§.

    • Í∞Å layerÎäî 2Í∞úÏùò sub-layerÎ•º Í∞ÄÏßÄÍ≥† ÏûàÎã§.
    • Ï≤´Î≤àÏß∏ sub-layer: masked multi-head self-attention(Q = K = V)
    • ÎëêÎ≤àÏß∏ sub-layer: position-wise fully connected feed-forward network(FFN) (two linear transformations, RELU activationÏúºÎ°ú Íµ¨ÏÑ±)
    • FFN(x)=max(0,xW1+b1)W2+b2FFN(x) = max(0, xW_1 + b_1)W_2 + b_2FFN(x)=max(0,xW1‚Äã+b1‚Äã)W2‚Äã+b2‚Äã
  • mn=FFN(MultiHead(mn‚àí1,mn‚àí1,mn‚àí1))m^n = FFN(MultiHead(m^{n-1}, m^{n-1}, m^{n-1}))mn=FFN(MultiHead(mn‚àí1,mn‚àí1,mn‚àí1)) m0=[cs,1word+PE(1),...,cs,tword+PE(t)]m^0 = [c_{s,1}^{word} + PE(1), ..., c_{s,t}^{word} + PE(t)]m0=[cs,1word‚Äã+PE(1),...,cs,tword‚Äã+PE(t)] cs,‚â§tctx=mNc_{s,\leq t}^{ctx} = m^Ncs,‚â§tctx‚Äã=mN
  • mnm^nmn: nÎ≤àÏß∏ context encoderÎ†àÏù¥Ïñ¥Ïùò ÏïÑÏõÉÌíã PE(.)PE(.)PE(.): positional encoding function

4. Slot-Turn Attention

  • turn-level relevant informationÏùÑ contextual representationÏóêÏÑú Í≤ÄÏ∂úÌï¥ÎÇ¥Í∏∞ ÏúÑÌï¥ ÏÇ¨Ïö©
  • cs,tturn=MultiHead(hs,cs,‚â§tctx,cs,‚â§tctx)c_{s,t}^{turn} = MultiHead(h^s, c_{s,\leq t}^{ctx},c_{s,\leq t}^{ctx})cs,tturn‚Äã=MultiHead(hs,cs,‚â§tctx‚Äã,cs,‚â§tctx‚Äã)
  • Ïù¥Î°úÏù∏Ìï¥ word-level and turn-level Ïùò relevant informationÏùÑ historical dialoguesÏóêÏÑú ÏñªÏñ¥ÎÇº Ïàò ÏûàÎã§.

5. Global-Local Fusion Gate

  • global contextÏôÄ local utteranceÏùò Í∑†ÌòïÏùÑ ÎßûÏ∂îÍ∏∞ ÏúÑÌï¥, contextual informationÍ≥º current turn informationÏùò ÎπÑÏú®ÏùÑ Ï°∞Ï†àÌï®.
  • cs,tword,¬†¬†cs,tturnc_{s,t}^{word},~~ c_{s,t}^{turn}cs,tword‚Äã,¬†¬†cs,tturn‚ÄãÏóê Îî∞Îùº globalÍ≥º localÏ†ïÎ≥¥Í∞Ä Ïñ¥ÎñªÍ≤å Í≤∞Ìï©ÎêòÏñ¥ÏïºÌï†ÏßÄ ÏïåÎ†§Ï£ºÎäî fusion gate mechanismÏùÑ ÏÇ¨Ïö©
  • gs,t=œÉ(Wg‚®Ä[cs,tword;cs,tturn])g_{s,t} = \sigma(W_g\bigodot[c_{s,t}^{word};c_{s,t}^{turn}])gs,t‚Äã=œÉ(Wg‚Äã‚®Ä[cs,tword‚Äã;cs,tturn‚Äã])

  • cs,tgate=gs,t‚®Çcs,tword+(1‚àígs,t‚®Çcs,tturn)c_{s,t}^gate = g_{s,t}\bigotimes c_{s,t}^{word} + (1-g_{s,t}\bigotimes c_{s,t}^{turn})cs,tg‚Äãate=gs,t‚Äã‚®Çcs,tword‚Äã+(1‚àígs,t‚Äã‚®Çcs,tturn‚Äã)

    • Wg‚ààR2d√ódW_g \in R^{2d\times d}Wg‚Äã‚ààR2d√ód
    • œÉ\sigmaœÉ: Sigmoid
    • ‚®Ä\bigodot‚®Ä, ‚®Ç\bigotimes‚®Ç
  • os,to_{s,t}os,t‚Äã = LayerNorm(Linear(Dropout(cs,tgatec_{s,t}^{gate}cs,tgate‚Äã)))

  • value vtv_tvt‚ÄãÏóê ÎåÄÌïú ÌôïÎ•†Î∂ÑÌè¨ÏôÄ training objective p(vt‚à£U‚â§t,¬†R‚â§t,s)=exp(‚àí‚à£‚à£os,t‚àíhtv‚à£‚à£2)‚àëv‚Ä≤‚ààVsexp(‚àí‚à£‚à£os,t‚àíhtv‚Ä≤‚à£‚à£2)p(v_t|U_{\leq t},~R_{\leq t}, s) = exp(-||o_{s,t} - h_t^v||2)\over {\sum{v'\in V_s}exp(-||o_{s,t}-h_t^{v'}||2)}‚àëv‚Ä≤‚ààVs‚Äãexp(‚àí‚à£‚à£os,t‚Äã‚àíhtv‚Ä≤‚Äã‚à£‚à£2)p(vt‚Äã‚à£U‚â§t‚Äã,¬†R‚â§t‚Äã,s)=exp(‚àí‚à£‚à£os,t‚Äã‚àíhtv‚Äã‚à£‚à£2)‚Äã LdstL{dst}Ldst =‚àës‚ààS‚àët=1T‚àílog(p(v^t‚à£U‚â§t,¬†R‚â§t,s))= \sum_{s\in S}\sum ^T_{t = 1}-log(p(\hat v_t|U_{\leq t},~R_{\leq t}, s))=‚àës‚ààS‚Äã‚àët=1T‚Äã‚àílog(p(v^t‚Äã‚à£U‚â§t‚Äã,¬†R‚â§t‚Äã,s))

    • VsV_sVs‚Äã: candidate value set of slot s
    • v^t‚ààVs\hat v_t \in V_sv^t‚Äã‚ààVs‚Äã: ground-truth value of slot s

State Transition Prediction

  • relevant contextÎ•º Îçî Ïûò Ìè¨Ï∞©ÌïòÍ∏∞ ÏúÑÌï¥, auxiliary binary classification taskÏÇ¨Ïö©.
  • cs,tstp=tanh(Wc‚äôcs,tgate)c_{s,t}^{stp} = tanh(W_c \odot c_{s,t}^{gate})cs,tstp‚Äã=tanh(Wc‚Äã‚äôcs,tgate‚Äã)

  • ps,tstp=œÉ(Wp‚äô[cs,tstp;cs,t‚àí1stp])p_{s,t}^{stp} = \sigma (W_p \odot [c_{s,t}^{stp};c_{s, t-1}^{stp}])ps,tstp‚Äã=œÉ(Wp‚Äã‚äô[cs,tstp‚Äã;cs,t‚àí1stp‚Äã])

    • Wc‚ààRd√ódW_c \in \R^{d\times d}Wc‚Äã‚ààRd√ód
    • Wc‚ààR2dW_c \in \R^{2d}Wc‚Äã‚ààR2d
    • t=1t = 1t=1ÏùºÎïåÎäî cs,tstpc_{s,t}^{stp}cs,tstp‚ÄãÏôÄ zero vectorsÎ•º concatÌï®.
  • binary CE loss (ys,tstpy_{s,t}^{stp}ys,tstp‚Äã: ground-truth transition labels // ps,tstpp_{s,t}^{stp}ps,tstp‚Äã: transition probability)
  • Lstp=‚àës‚ààS‚àët=1T‚àíys,tstp¬†.¬†log(ps,tstp)L_{stp} = \sum_{s\in S}\sum_{t = 1}^T -y_{s,t}^{stp}~.~log(p_{s,t}^{stp})Lstp‚Äã=‚àës‚ààS‚Äã‚àët=1T‚Äã‚àíys,tstp‚Äã¬†.¬†log(ps,tstp‚Äã)

Adaptive Objective

  • hard slotsÏôÄ samplesÏóê Í¥ÄÌïú optimizationÏùÑ encourageÌïúÎã§.
  • all slotsÏùò learningÏùÑ balancingÌï®.
  • accsvalacc_s^{val}accsval‚Äã: accuracy of slot s on validation set

  • slot-level difficulty if accsval‚â§accs‚Ä≤valacc_s^{val} \leq acc_{s'}^{val}accsval‚Äã‚â§accs‚Ä≤val‚Äã; ‚Üí slot s Í∞Ä slot s'Î≥¥Îã§ Îçî Ïñ¥Î†§Ïö¥ Í≤É. ‚Üí Œ±\alphaŒ±: slot-level difficulty

    • Œ±s=1‚àíaccsval‚àës‚Ä≤‚ààS1‚àíaccs‚Ä≤val‚ãÖ‚à£S‚à£\alpha_s = {1 - acc_s^{val} \over {\sum_{s'\in S} 1-acc_{s'}^{val}}} \cdot |S|Œ±s‚Äã=‚àës‚Ä≤‚ààS‚Äã1‚àíaccs‚Ä≤val‚Äã1‚àíaccsval‚Äã‚Äã‚ãÖ‚à£S‚à£

  • sample-level difficulty ‚Üí Suppose there are two samples {(Ut,Rt),(s,vt)}\left\{(U_t, R_t),(s, v_t)\right\}{(Ut‚Äã,Rt‚Äã),(s,vt‚Äã)} and {(Ut‚Ä≤,Rt‚Ä≤),(s‚Ä≤,vt‚Ä≤)}\left\{(U_{t'}, R_{t'}),(s', v_{t'})\right\}{(Ut‚Ä≤‚Äã,Rt‚Ä≤‚Äã),(s‚Ä≤,vt‚Ä≤‚Äã)} ‚Üí ÎßåÏïΩ former confidence Í∞Ä latterÎ≥¥Îã§ Îçî ÎÇÆÎã§Î©¥, Ï≤´Î≤àÏß∏ sampleÏù¥ ÎëêÎ≤àÏß∏Î≥¥Îã§ Îçî Ïñ¥Î†§Ïö¥ Í≤É. ‚Üí Œ≤\betaŒ≤: sample level difficulty

    • Œ≤(s,vt)=(1‚àíp(s,vt))Œ≥\beta(s, v_t) = (1 - p(s, v_t))^\gammaŒ≤(s,vt‚Äã)=(1‚àíp(s,vt‚Äã))Œ≥
    • p(s,vt)p(s,v_t)p(s,vt‚Äã): confidence of sample (Ut,Rt),(s,vt)(U_t, R_t),(s, v_t)(Ut‚Äã,Rt‚Äã),(s,vt‚Äã) Œ≥\gammaŒ≥: hyper-parameter
  • Ladapt(s,vt)=‚àíŒ±sŒ≤(s,vt)log(p(s,vt))L_{adapt}(s,v_t) = -\alpha_s\beta(s, v_t)log(p(s, v_t))Ladapt‚Äã(s,vt‚Äã)=‚àíŒ±s‚ÄãŒ≤(s,vt‚Äã)log(p(s,vt‚Äã))
  • slot sÍ∞Ä ÌèâÍ∑† slotÏùò difficultyÎ≥¥Îã§ ÎÜíÎã§Î©¥, Œ±s\alpha_sŒ±s‚ÄãÎäî sÏóê ÎåÄÌïú lossÎ•º ÌÇ§Ïö∏ Í≤ÉÏù¥Îã§. ÎπÑÏä∑ÌïòÍ≤å, sampleÏùò optimizationÏù¥ low confidenceÎ•º Í∞ñÍ≥† ÏûàÎã§Î©¥ lossÎäî Ïª§ÏßàÍ≤ÉÏù¥Îã§.

Optimization

  • During joint training, we optimize the sum of these two loss functions as following Ljoint=Ldst+LstpL_{joint} = L_{dst} + L_{stp}Ljoint‚Äã=Ldst‚Äã+Lstp‚Äã
  • At the fine-tuning phase, we adopt the adaptive objective to fine-tune DST task as following Lfinetune=‚àës‚ààS‚àët=1TLadapt(s,v^t)L_{finetune} = \sum_{s\in S}\sum^T_{t=1}L_{adapt(s, \hat v_t)}Lfinetune‚Äã=‚àës‚ààS‚Äã‚àët=1T‚ÄãLadapt(s,v^t‚Äã)‚Äã

Ï∞∏Í≥† ÏûêÎ£å

  • ÎÖºÎ¨∏: A Contextual Hierarchical Attention Network with Adaptive Objective for Dialogue State Tracking
  • GitHub: CHAN-DST
